ideas.title: Unified Agent A8 Master Platform
ideas.description: Integrate all 25 goal implementations into a single, cohesive platform with unified API, centralized management, and cross-system communication.

ideas.title: Quantum-Enhanced AI Security Framework
ideas.description: Combine quantum computing (G13) with cybersecurity (G16) and AI ethics (G25) to create next-generation security platform with quantum-resistant encryption and AI-powered threat detection.

ideas.title: Digital Twin Climate Simulation Ecosystem
ideas.description: Merge digital twins (G20) with climate science (G24) and space technology (G22) to create comprehensive Earth monitoring and climate prediction system.

ideas.title: AR/VR Bioinformatics Visualization Platform
